description: Dive into the world of 3D web experiences with efficient rendering techniques in React Three Fiber, explore the art of scroll-driven animations, and elevate your notification UX with precise timing. Unleash the power of CSS shape commands for unique design, and optimize server-side performance in Nuxt 3 for high-traffic applications. Enhance your deployment workflow by integrating Astro with Netlify, and spark creativity by animating list items with custom transitions.
joke: Why did the developer go broke? Because they kept caching all their problems!
challenge: Create an interactive scroll-driven animation where the main heading changes as the user scrolls. Use HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to animate the text color, size, and position based on scroll position. Optionally, enhance the experience with parallax effects or dynamic background changes, providing a visually engaging and responsive interaction for users.
